data.title: WMS Application Go-Live Trainer
data.description: When I was a bachelor's student, I took a job as a freelance trainer for one week at PT. Pertamina Lubricants, based on DSP Batakan, Balikpapan. My daily job was to :
subDescription: Train employees to use the Warehouse Management System Applications
Working with their company to handle inbound and outbound
Reporting issues in WMS applications to customer service

data.title: Study Independent React JS Front-End Engineer
data.description: I also participated in a Study independent Program at Kampus Merdeka. I asked many questions and learned about web development. My daily tasks included:
subDescription: Learn basic UI/UX with Figma, Git, React.Js, Redux, GraphQL, and Deployment Project

data.title: Frontend Web Developer
subDescription: Slicing from the UI/UX design wireframe
Build the Tambak Udang frontend using the Angular framework
Collaborate with the System Analyst, UI/UX designer, and Backend
Mentoring class with materials about Analyst System, Ui/UX, Github, CI/CD, Angular, and Lumen JWT

data.title: Assistant Lecturer
subDescription: Teaching a web programming practice course for one semester (3 SKS)
Preparing learning materials about HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, jQuery, and MySQL

data.title: Web Programmer
subDescription: Fixing bugs at Djuragan.com- Working with Ci4 - Fixing bugs at Djuragan.com
